data.description:
Welcome to UltraCity, where the neon-lit streets pulse with the rhythm of cybernetic life. Immerse yourself in **the heart of a cyberpunk metropolis** as one of the elite Operators, capable of projecting your consciousness into **a team of skilled heroes** known as the NEON Squad.

![{"height":320,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031334_409258475508039_8965680661115487468_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=oe32AT2boBkQ7kNvgHRBJsR&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBFmFj69rGcQRC6CKbmFQBB7uKJTcxR5iBnU9t-eMEbWQ&oe=6705232F)

Gather **your friends or online allies** and navigate the vibrant, wacky world from the comfort of a virtual bar. A captivating **holographic table** serves as your interface to key locations in the city and beyond. You'll undertake **daring missions** on behalf of the **powerful corporations**, all under the guidance of an enigmatic Handler.

![{"height":320,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003272_521721420250791_1749029299216790958_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=nOEStjSxG0MQ7kNvgHaSurN&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBxmKxZ9YhkLPyh6hQ4a13O80U5WeMaez6KtukEenI3dQ&oe=670500E9)

But success demands more than just brute force. As you navigate the dangerous streets, underworld, and irradiated badlands, **strategic thinking** and **clever teamwork** will be your greatest assets. Coordinate your squad's actions in **thrilling turn-based tactical battles**, where every decision could mean the difference between victory and defeat.

![{"height":320,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035389_531689589532044_676684193823177442_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ooBew1aUrY4Q7kNvgEuBLPH&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAy1lPT6cK1UkUrklWJoYMHsirwTL-h1yBLJCdLCyqEKA&oe=6705060C)

Pre-mission planning is crucial. **Wager wisely** to secure valuable resources and credits, essential for **recruiting new squad members** and **crafting advanced weaponry and cybernetic enhancements**. Choose your team carefully, each member bringing unique skills and abilities to the table. **Customize your squad members** to suit your playstyle!

![{"height":320,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75258663_1026413825701774_4822464484390551879_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=_4ysFDc708QQ7kNvgFtTJLB&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDfzvttsOkQ4i0qlCL8DQnGrbkolWRPtXL3gLP_8b85Ow&oe=6704FA55)

**Forge alliances, outsmart your enemies, and rise to the top of the cybernetic food chain**. Are you ready to become a legend in the AGDA 2024 nominated NEON Squad Tactics?

![{"height":500,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982660_890964689556631_4106676401776551012_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=eVWFT1SrGpwQ7kNvgHSVNyv&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA6l3OuRM8xfGlAdG1IqrezKB2gV-P5Q9CjcLC3R3fgQA&oe=67052800)

changelog.change_log:
- Fix for some ultimate sometimes not purchasable
- Visual fixes for the Quest 3
- AOE animation fixes
- General optimisations
